name: Drudge Droid (Demo)
description:
If you enjoy this demo be sure to vote for us on Steam Greenlight! Your vote is very appreciated! Vote here: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...

Drudge Droid Demo

Play as Drudge Droid, the finest hard working Droid around. You've been put to the challenge of completing many difficult levels filled with obstacles and problem solving puzzles, can you do it? Use movable blocks to assist you, jump over sawblades, crouch under lasers, find keys to unlock doors and expect the unexpected, but under all circumstances, do not get decommissioned. (All Drudge Droids are recycled to house hold items such as toasters and microwaves. Rest assured that should you die you will live on)
